basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Ryanne Hauschild Scholarship for Kinesiolog

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are majoring in Kinesiology  Exercise/Fitness Management. Eligibility Requirements Majoring in Kinesiology  Exercise/Fitness Management Must be a student of good character Provide (2) letters of character reference GPA and financial need may be considered when students of similar character are evaluated Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
